revision.text: Probably: An Essay on Taste ... With three dissertations on the same subject. By Mr. de Voltaire. Mr. d'Alembert, F.R.S. Mr. de Montesquieu. by Alexander GERARD, D.D. (A. Millar: London; A. Kincaid & J. Bell: Edinburgh, 1759). [[http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/560000156]]
